## ComponentContainer.getProvider() method

getProvider provides a type safe interface where it can only be called with a field name present in NameServiceMapping interface.

Firebase SDKs providing services should extend NameServiceMapping interface to register themselves.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getProvider<T extends Name>(name: T): Provider<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>T</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Provider<T>`
